Dear XYZ,
I would like to apply for the position of Global Product Manager - Autoimmunity.  I have read the job advert / description and feel my skills and experience lend well to the vacancy.
I have a deep understanding of the autoimmunity market gained through commercial and practical experience.  As a HCPC registered Biomedical Scientist I have validated, used and maintained chemiluminescence methodology to investigate autoimmune, infectious, endocrine, anaemia and cardiac disease.  Whilst working in a medical laboratory I gained valuable experience necessary to deliver user focused strategy for product success in the commercial market.
Whilst working for A.Menarini as Autoimmunity Product Manager I successfully managed IFA and chemiluminescence product life cycles, from concept through to successful implementation.  The autoimmunity market is complex and relatively niche.  I have well rounded knowledge of this market that facilitates market growth and improved customer satisfaction, as evidenced by my time at A.Menarini.  Through my previous Product Manager role I received technical sales training and achieved a high level of competence.  This training and experience, coupled with laboratory management experience results in comprehensive procurement knowledge to support sales activity.
I enjoy delivering training material and education.  There has been a thread of responsibility for training throughout a varied career which includes guest lecturing and mentoring at undergraduate and postgraduate level.  As A.Menarini Product Manager I developed training material to meet ISO requirements for both internal and external users.
If given the opportunity I would be excited to work with IDS.  I feel the culture and vision outlined by the organisation matches my own.  I am passionate, enjoy challenge and innovation and maintain high professional standards for those and colleagues.
Please refer to my C.V. for more information.
Yours faithfully,
Jake Morrow BSc (Hons) MSc CSci MIBMS
